source:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_00The shadow of death hangs over Virdjala.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
カステッルム・ベロジナのアルパは、冒険者のことを待っていたようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_01A merchant suddenly bursts into the castellum claiming that fighting has broken out between groups of Ananta in Virdjala. Upon hearing this unsettling news, Alpa's immediate concern is that her mother would be angry that Ananta should be allowed to cause trouble so close to Velodyna. Showing no signs of hesitation, she and J'olhmyn race off in the direction of the valley, heedless of the dangers they may face.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

アルパと話した。血相を変えて駆け込んできた動転した行商人によると、街道を進んだ先で、アナンタ族同士が諍いを起こしているらしい。ギラバニア辺境地帯のヴィルジャラの涸れ谷で、「アルパ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_02<tab>You discover the corpses of Qalyana tribeswomen, yet no sign of their attackers. After quickly assessing the situation, Alpa gives the command to search for any survivors that may still be in the area.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_02<tab>アルパと合流した。争っていたのは、カリヤナ派のアナンタ族たちだったようだ。生き残っているカリヤナ派のアナンタ族を探そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_03<tab>A wounded Qalyana who escaped the bloodshed reveals that an internal conflict has erupted in her tribe. Several of her people oppose worshipping the primal Sri Lakshmi and have split from the rest of the Qalyana. Unwilling to accept this, those in the thrall of the false goddess have marked the insurrectionists for death. Hoping to locate the remaining survivors before it is too late, you continue the search.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_03<tab>カリヤナの闘士と話した。偽りの美神召喚を続けることに疑問を感じた一部のカリヤナ派が、カリヤナ・ニリヤから逃げ出してきたという。生き残っている「カリヤナの脱走者」を探そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_04<tab>You find the other separatists just as their pursuers appear. There is no choice but to stand and fight.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_04<tab>カリヤナの脱走者と話した。街道の治安維持のため、追っ手のカリヤナ派アナンタ族を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_05<tab>With a little timely assistance, you are able to repel the Qalyana fanatics. After the battle, the Vira broodmother Sarisha arrives and offers the refugees asylum in Vira Nilya. However, they are determined to express their gratitude for Alpa's courageous rescue by joining the Gatekeepers. She gladly welcomes her newfound allies and leads them to Velodyna.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_05<tab>追っ手のカリヤナ派アナンタ族を討伐した。ウィルラ派の指導者サリーシャは、行き場のないカリヤナの脱走者たちを、ウィルラ・ニリヤに迎えることを提案する。しかし、カリヤナの脱走者たちは、この誘いを辞退し、アルパの下で働くことを望んだ。カステッルム・ベロジナの「アルパ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_06<tab>J'olhmyn expresses concerns that accepting the Qalyana refugees carries the risk of spies infiltrating the Resistance. However, Alpa believes that the Qalyana would have little to gain from such an act of espionage and that any treachery can be dealt with as needed. While J'olhmyn is able to accept Alpa's argument, she remains cautious of the new recruits. Shortly after, Sarisha arrives to look over the castellum and reminds Alpa of the consequences should it fail to meet her standards. Although Alpa is extremely anxious to hear her mother's evaluation, she has no choice but to wait patiently, but is finally able to breathe a sigh of relief when the fortress passes the inspection. Not only was Alpa's work on the castellum beyond all expectations, but her bravery and even-handed diplomacy left a deep impression on the broodmother, who gives her blessing to continue working with the Gatekeepers.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SEQ_06<tab>アルパと話した。カリヤナからの脱走者を受け入れようとするアルパに対し、ジャ・オルミンは、解放軍に潜入するための間諜ではないかと疑うが、アルパは、そのことを承知の上で、外見や信仰の違いを乗り越えてきた自分たちならば、かつての敵も味方に変えることができるはずだと説く。脱皮を終え、約束通り関所の視察に訪れたサリーシャは、アルパの仕事ぶりを認め、娘の成長を喜んだ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Alpa in Virdjala.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TODO_00<tab>ヴィルジャラの涸れ谷でアルパと合流

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TODO_01<tab>Search for Qalyana survivors.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TODO_01<tab>生き残っているカリヤナ派のアナンタ族を探す

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_001<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Good evening)) ((Good morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good day)) ((Good evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_001<tab>しゅ～……よくぞ参った、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>よ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_002<tab>I don't know how to thank you for all your help. The castellum has become everything I'd hoped for! Travelers and Resistance members alike have been sssinging its praises!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_002おぬしらの尽力もあって、ここの設備も充実してきた。
通行者にとっての利便性も高く、
ギラバニアを守るに相応しい関所となったと言えるじゃろう。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_003<tab>As long as nothing untoward happens, I'm confident that it'll pass mussster with Mother.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_003ここのところ、大きな問題も起こっておらぬし、
今度こそ、いつ母上が視察に来ても大丈夫な状態じゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_100_003<tab>That reminds me. How's your mother's molting coming along?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_100_003<tab>そういえば、母上の脱皮の時期は、もうすぐなんだろ？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_200_003<tab>Eshana informs me that the upper layer of skin is beginning to ssseparate. There's not much time left.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_200_003うむ、エシャナからの報告書によると、
母上の脱皮状況は、ついに「ガサガサ期」を迎えたようじゃ。
つまり、すぐにでも脱皮が始まるような状態……ということじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_300_003<tab>Well, we're set to pass the inspection with flying colors, so there's nothing to fear! Unless some unforeseen catastrophe occurs...
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_300_003<tab>なら、もしも今面倒なことが起こったら……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MERCHANT03040_000_004<tab>Captain Alpa! It's a catastrophe!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MERCHANT03040_000_004<tab>た、隊長さん……大変だ、大変だよ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_005<tab>What do you mean?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_005<tab>しゅ～……そんなに慌てて、どうしたというのじゃ？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MERCHANT03040_000_006<tab>Ananta... <pant> They're fighting among themselves, over in Virdjala! It looked like they were out for blood, so I ran for my life!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MERCHANT03040_000_006ヴィルジャラの涸れ谷で、アナンタ族同士がモメてるんだ！
あやうく、巻き込まれそうになって……
アンタも同じアナンタ族なんだ、どうにかしておくれよ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_007<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_007<tab>しゅ～！？　なんじゃとぉ！？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_100_007<tab>J'olhmyn! If you'd kept your mouth shut, this would never have happened!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_100_007<tab>オルミンが余計なことを言うからじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_100_007<tab>I suppose I was tempting fate a bit, but you can't blame me for it!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_100_007<tab>ははは……まさか本当に面倒なことが起こるとは。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_008<tab>Why does this have to happen now? If Mother finds out that Ananta are causing trouble near Castellum Velodyna, she'll hold me responsssible! J'olhmyn, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─follow me!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_008ええい、急ぎ片付けねば、母上が脱皮してしまう！
すぐに「ヴィルジャラの涸れ谷」へ向かうぞ！
ついてまいれ！　)) (( )) 02 /var>、オルミン！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_010<tab>Battlemaids of the Qalyana! If any of you are still alive, sssay something!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_010しゅ～……こやつらは、カリヤナ派の連中ではないか！
いったい、誰にやられたというのじゃ……？
誰か、話ができる者はおらぬのか！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_011<tab>By Sri Lakshmi, it's a masssacre... There's no time to waste. We should search for survivors. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, try the southern part of the valley. J'olhmyn, come with me.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_011まだ息のある者がおるかもしれん、手分けして探すのじゃ！
わらわとオルミンは、北側を、
)) (( )) 02 /var>は、南側を当たってくれなのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_015<tab>What in Rhalgr's name happened here?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_015<tab>これは……ひどいねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_020<tab>Are you here to kill me? No, it would ssseem not...
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_020シュー……
追っ手……ではないようだな。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_021<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_021<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_022<tab>A sssurvivor! What happened here?
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_022おぬし、カリヤナ派の者じゃな。
いったい、何があったというのじゃ？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_023<tab>There has been a ssschism within the Qalyana. I and those of like mind no longer wish to devote ourselves to the false Sri Lakshmi.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_023お前たちウィルラ派は、常に自由のために戦っている……。
だというのに、我々は内に引き籠もり、偽りの美神に縋るだけ……
それが、いかに愚昧な行いであるか、今さらながらに気づいた。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_024<tab>We believe the Qalyana should work with the Vira for the future of Gyr Abania, instead of sssequestering ourselves away from the world. Many of usss voiced our opposition, but the dreamers heard not our pleas.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_024だから、私は、同じ考えを持つ者を集め、
美神召喚を止めるよう声を上げた……が、無駄だった……。
夢見る姉妹たちには、もはや我らの声は届かない……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_025<tab>And when you tried to break from the tribe, they hunted you down?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_025<tab>それで逃げようとしたところを、追っ手に襲われたんだね？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_026<tab>Yesss, ssstrider. Most of us were ssslain. Those who sssurvived the ambush are being pursued as we ssspeak.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_026シュー……
半数以上は殺されてしまったが、まだ生き残りはいるはず……
一刻も早く戻って助けねば……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_027<tab>What do you make of this, Captain?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_027<tab>どうするんだい、アルパ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_028<tab>This is troubling indeed... There are so few routes through the valleys that anyone passing is bound to be caught up in the fighting. Those killers won't think twice about cutting down anyone who ssstands between them and their prey.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_028しゅ～……近くには、山岳地帯へ通じる唯一の街道がある。
ふたたび戦いが起これば、通行人が巻き込まれるやもしれん。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_029<tab>I can't allow this ssslaughter to continue! The Qalyana and we Vira have our differences, but they are still our sisters!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_029それに、育ちは違えど、こやつらはわらわたちの姉妹じゃ。
一方的に殺されようとしている姉妹を、放ってはおけぬ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_030<tab>Then it's up to us to beat some sense into those dreamers.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_030<tab>なら、カチ込みをかけるしかないねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_031<tab>No. This is an Ananta affair, and I cannot involve the Gatekeepers. I'll deal with it myself.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_031しゅ～……じゃが、此度の件は我らアナンタの問題じゃ！
国境警備隊を巻き込むわけにはいかぬ！！
……同族の者らだけでなんとかしてみせるのじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_032<tab>Alpa! Have you forgotten why we're here in the first place?
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_032はあ？
……まったく、お前さんは本当にバカな子だねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_033<tab>What are you talking about!?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_033<tab>しゅっ！？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_A1_000_001<tab>Think, Alpa, think!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_A1_000_001<tab>ジャ・オルミンの言うとおり

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_A1_000_002<tab>Why do you think J'olhmyn and I are here?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_A1_000_002<tab>本当に馬鹿な娘だ

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_035<tab>Stop being obtuse and sssay what you mean, or get out of my way!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_035<tab>しゅしゅっ！？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_036<tab>We're here because a merchant begged the Gatekeepers for help. You yourself said the dreamers won't think twice about cutting down innocents. This is <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> problem!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_036さっき、お前さんが言ってただろう？
この戦いを放っておけば、次は誰かが巻き込まれるかもってさ。
アナンタ族だけじゃない、ギラバニア全体の問題なんだよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_037<tab>It's the Gatekeepers' duty to keep the peace. If that means intervening in tribal disputes, then so be it! Isn't that right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_037街道の治安維持は、オレたち国境警備隊の立派な仕事だ。
そうだろう、)) (( )) 02 /var>？
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_Q2_000_000<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_A2_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_A2_000_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_039<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_039<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_040<tab>...You're right. We'll sssettle this together.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_040しゅ～……
オルミン、)) (( )) 02 /var>……。
……感謝するぞ、ふたりとも。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_041<tab>The dreamers are ssstill out there looking for you. Go to Castellum Velodyna and tell the Gatekeepers that Alpa sssent you. No harm will come to you.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_041なに、案ずることはない……。
おぬしは安全な場所まで下がっておれ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_100_041<tab>Youngling of the Vira, you have my gratitude.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_100_041<tab>シュー……すまない、ウィルラの若者よ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_042<tab>J'olhmyn, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! The other sssurvivors need our help. Let's move!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_042我らは国境警備隊……ギラバニアの治安を守る者たちじゃ！
オルミン、)) (( )) 02 /var>、ついてまいれ！
生き残っているカリヤナの脱走者を探すのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_045<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_045<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_050<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_050<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANADESERTERS03040_000_060<tab>The pursssuers have tracked us down, but we have no ssstrength left to fight. Thisss is the end...
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANADESERTERS03040_000_060シュー……
この怪我では、追っ手を振り切ることは……
もはや、ここまでか……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_100_060<tab>It's not over yet. We're here to help!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_100_060<tab>諦めるのは、まだ早いんじゃないかい？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_061<tab>That'sss right! You're under the protection of the Velodyna Gatekeepers now!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_061そのとおりじゃ！
国境警備隊が来たからには、おぬしらの命、ここで散らせはせん！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_062<tab>It's time to show them what we're made of!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_062)) (( )) 02 /var>、オルミン！
いざ、参るぞ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_065<tab>Why must the dreamers go to such lengthsss?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_065<tab>しゅ～……なぜ、カリヤナ派同士が殺し合うのじゃ……？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_070<tab>I'm glad we got here in time, but it looks like we've still got work to do!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_070<tab>生き残りを見つけたのはいいが、まだ安心できないねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_100_070<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_100_070<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_110<tab>To think they'd appear in such numbers... They're relentlesss!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_110<tab>しゅ～……しつこい連中じゃ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY03040_000_111<tab>(-Raging Qalyana-)Who dares interfere!? Aaah!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY03040_000_111<tab>(-カリヤナの雑兵-)……な、なんだ貴様は……ぐわぁっ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MZHETTIA_000_112<tab>There you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thought you'd steal all the glory for yourself, eh? You're not the only hero around here!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MZHETTIA_000_112なんだか騒がしいと思ったら、楽しそうなことやってるじゃねーか！
オレも混ぜてくださいよ、師匠！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_113<tab>Although I only came to admire the griffin statues, I shan't stand by while my friends are in danger! It's time for Tahla Molkoh, the Invisible Adder, to bare her fangs!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_113非番を利用して、グリフィン像を見に来ただけだったのですが、
仲間の窮地となれば、無視はできません！
「双蛇党の幽霊隊士」、タラ・モルコー、国境警備隊に加勢します！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_114<tab>"Invisible Adder“? Is that because the others ignore you?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_114<tab>ハハハ……相変わらず、ダサい二つ名だねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_115<tab>M'zhet! Tahla! I've never been so happy to see you two!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_115しゅっしゅっしゅ……
まこと心強い味方が来てくれたものじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_116<tab>Hear me, dreamers of the Qalyana! Your crimes are beyond redemption, beyond forgivenesss! It's time for you to pay!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_116さあ、カリヤナ派の者どもよ！　戦いはこれからじゃ！
我らの武勇、とくとその目に刻むがよい！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_080<tab>Alpa! We were on our way to inssspect your facilities when we heard the cries of battle. I might have guessed the Qalyana were involved, but I never expected to find you here!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_080シュー……脱皮を終えて、関所の視察へと向かう途中、
何やら争う声が聞こえると思って来てみれば……。
やはり、カリヤナ派が原因でしたか……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_081<tab>What is the meaning of thisss?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_081<tab>アルパ、何のつもりですか？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_082<tab>Mother, lisssten to me! These Qalyana are not our enemies!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_082しゅ～……母上、話を聞いてほしいのじゃ！
この者たちは、わらわたちの敵ではない！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_083<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, what is she talking about?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_083<tab>……どういうことですか？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_084<tab>If these Qalyana do indeed reject the false Sri Lakshmi, I would hear it from them.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_084シュー……なるほど……。
この者らは、カリヤナを脱しようと、逃げてきた者たちなのですね。
ならば、娘の言うとおり、敵視する相手ではありませんね。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_085<tab>Tell us the truth of thisss day.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_085<tab>あなたたちの中に、治療の必要な者はいますか？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_086<tab>Our own sssisters turned against us because we dared to seek another way. Were it not for the intervention of your daughter and her comrades, we would have been ssslaughtered. But while none of us are gravely injured, our sssorrow is beyond words...
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_086シュー……幸い、致命傷の者はいません。
しかし、慣れない戦闘に加え、相手は昨日までの同胞……
皆、それぞれ思うことがあるのは致し方ないですね……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_087<tab>...Sisters, you are welcome to stay with us in Vira Nilya for as long as you need. You will have food and shelter and time to think on your futures.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_087すぐに割り切るのは難しいかと思いますが、
まずは気持ちを休める場所が必要でしょう。
あなた方は、我々ウィルラ派が受け入れます。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_088<tab>That you would show your sworn enemies such kindness...
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_088これまで幾度も衝突してきた我々を、
助けていただいた上に迎え入れてくれるとは……
なんと感謝を申し上げればよいのか……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_089<tab>However, it is with profound regret that we must refuse your most graciousss offer. Our minds were made up before your arrival.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_089このご恩を無碍にするようで心苦しいのですが、
我々には、すでに決めた腹があるのです。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_090<tab>Pray tell, what will you do?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_090<tab>ほう、それは？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_091<tab>Alpa, brave and benevolent daughter of the Vira! Please, allow usss to join the Velodyna Gatekeepers!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_091シュー……国境警備隊の若き隊長よ、
我々をあなたの隊で働かせてほしい。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_092<tab>Join us? But why?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_092<tab>しゅ～……なにゆえ国境警備隊への入隊を志望する？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_093<tab>We were raised to fear the ssstriders─told they could not be trusssted. And so we turned away from the world and placed our hopes in a false god.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_093……これまで我々は、ヒトは恐ろしく、
信用に値しないものと教えられ、そう信じてきた。
偽りの美神に縋ったのもそれが原因だ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_094<tab>But when you and your comrades came to our rescue, we saw the error of our ways. We need not─nay, <var 1A 02 /var>cannot<var 1A 01 /var> live apart.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_094しかし、それでもあなたとヒトの子は、
命懸けで我々を救ってくれた。
私は、あなた方の姿に、ヒトとアナンタの未来を視た。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_095<tab>That's what my work with the Gatekeepers has taught me. There are many peoples that call Gyr Abania home. I just want to make it a sssafer place.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_095しゅ～……わらわは、国境警備隊の任務を通して、
ヒトもアナンタも、ギラバニアを故郷に持つ家族と知った。
故に、この地に住む家族を守りたかった……それだけじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_096<tab>Of course, we all have our own opinions and beliefs, but our goals are the sssame, and that's what matters. We'd be happy to have you!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_096国境警備隊は、ヒトとアナンタが協力し合って成り立つ隊じゃ。
それ故、思想や信仰の違いなど些末なこと。
わらわたちは、おぬしらを歓迎するぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_097<tab>Then we will commit ourssselves to your cause.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_097<tab>……必ずや、あなたのご厚意に応えてみせます。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_098<tab>It ssseems you have grown a great deal, Alpa.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_098我が娘、アルパよ。
どうやら、少し見ぬ間にひと皮剥けたようですね……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_099<tab>Are you sure? I'm ssstill about the same length as before.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_099しゅっしゅっしゅ……何を申す！
脱皮を終えてひと皮剥けたのは、母上の方であろう！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_100<tab>I don't think it was supposed to be taken literally...
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_100せっかく褒めてくれてるのに、
当の本人に伝わってないのが悲しいねぇ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_101<tab>Ha ha ha! She is still rather ssslow on the uptake, I see. It is jussst one of her many quirks, as I am sure you have noticed.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_101シュー……娘の察しの悪さは、相変わらずのようですね。
そなたにも苦労をかけます……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_102<tab>I must return to the village and share these recent developments with the brood. In the meantime, you should await my arrival at Velodyna. I still intend to look over the castellum.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_000_102さて、関所の視察へ向かう前に、一度巣へ戻り、
姉妹たちに、カリヤナ派の今後の動向に注意するよう伝えなければ。
あなた方は、「カステッルム・ベロジナ」で待っていてください。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_103<tab>Underssstood, Mother!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_103<tab>しゅ～……御意なのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_122<tab>I should report everything to my sssuperiors and request permission to accept the new Qalyana recruits.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_122しゅ～……
まずは、元カリヤナ派の者たちを、新兵として迎え入れてよいか、
上層部に問い合わせなければな……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_123<tab>Alpa, are you sure about this? This could all be a ploy to infiltrate the Resistance.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_123本当にいいのかい？
あいつらを引き入れちまってさ。
解放軍に潜入するための間諜かもしれないんだぞ？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_124<tab>If it is, it's a needlessly contrived one. Besssides, we're not about to hand them the keys to the place. We'll train them like any other recruits, and if they betray our trussst, we'll deal with it then and there.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_124しゅ～……もちろん、その可能性もあろう。
じゃが、外見や信仰の違いを乗り越えてきた我らなら、
かつての敵をも味方に変えることができるはず、そうであろう？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_125<tab>Fair enough. All the same, I'll keep a close eye on them.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_125やれやれ……
まっすぐに、そんなことを言われちゃ、かなわないねぇ。
目を光らせる役割は、オレが引き受けるとするか……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_100_125<tab>I know you will.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_100_125<tab>頼りにしておるぞ、オルミン。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_200_125<tab>Anyway, it looks like Mother's arrived for the inspection. This is the moment I've been dreading...
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_200_125……さて、どうやら母上が到着する頃合いのようじゃ。
ついに、この時がやってきたのじゃな……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_120<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_120<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_121<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_121<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_100_121<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_100_121<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_200_122<tab>The time has come to sssee the fruitsss of your labor.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_200_122<tab>シュー……お待たせしました。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_300_122<tab>I take it everything is in order.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_300_122さて、アルパ。
約束どおり、関所の視察に参りました。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_400_122<tab>If I find your efforts to be insufficient, you are coming ssstraight back to Vira Nilya. Is that clear?
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_400_122この関所が、辺境地帯を守るに相応しくないと判断した場合、
あなたは巣に戻り、すぐさま修行に入ってもらいます。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_500_122<tab>Cryssstal clear!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_500_122<tab>……承知の上じゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_600_122<tab>I will be looking over every ilm of this place. Nothing will essscape my notice.
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_600_122<tab>では、隅々まで拝見させていただきますよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_700_122<tab>My inssspection is complete. There is no denying that you have made...significant changes.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_700_122シュー……おまたせしましたね。
この関所を、じっくりと確認してきました。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_800_122<tab>Of course, this place is no stranger to change. The stone bridge once built by Ala Mhigans was plated in blackened sssteel by the Garleans, becoming a sssymbol of oppression. Now, it is the turn of the Ananta to leave our mark.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_800_122かつてアラミゴ人の手で築かれた石橋は、
帝国の手で黒き鉄によって覆われ、支配の象徴と化した。
ですが、今……アナンタの技により改装され、変わりつつある。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_900_122<tab>For better or worse, it ssstands as a tessstament to the history of Gyr Abania. Now, representatives of the various peoples of this land have united as the Velodyna Gatekeepers and transssformed this stronghold. It bodes well for the future.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_900_122まさに、この関所はギラバニア辺境地帯の歴史そのもの。
そして国境警備隊と、そこに協力する者たちの姿に、
異種族が協力する未来を視た気がします……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_910_122<tab>Ssso, does that mean...?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_910_122<tab>……で、では……母上！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_920_122<tab>Even before my arrival, you had already demonssstrated the qualities required of a leader. You fought to defend members of the Qalyana and have established a bond of trust with them─an achievement that many considered impossible.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_920_122本音を言うと、視察の前からアルパのことは認めていました。
あなたは、カリヤナ派を受け入れるという、
私たちにはできなかった偉業を成し遂げたからです。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_930_122<tab>You have learned much and grown to become a leader worthy of the highest praise and ressspect. As broodmother, as <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> mother, this makes me proud indeed.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_930_122きっと、国境警備隊を通して、様々な人に出会い、
様々なことを知ったことが、成長へと繋がったのでしょう。
ウィルラ派の指導者として、母親として、とても喜ばしいことです。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_940_122<tab>I don't know what to sssay...
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_940_122<tab>母上……ありがとうなのじゃ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_950_122<tab>Thisss concludes my visit. I hope you will all continue to sssupport Alpa in her endeavors. Until we meet again.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SARISHA_950_122それでは、私はこれで失礼します。
皆さん、これからも娘を支えてやってくださいね。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_100_126<tab>She's not the only one that feels that way. You've come a long way, Alpa. It looks like you won't be needing me as your mentor anymore!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_100_126……母上の言うとおり、アンタは立派に成長したよ。
お目付役のオレなんて、もう必要ないぐらいにね。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_200_126<tab>Now, now, J'olhmyn! You're not getting off that easily! I still need a sssecond-in-command, don't I? This place may have passed Mother's test but our work is far from over.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_200_126しゅ～……何を言っておるのじゃ。
おぬしは、わらわのお目付役である前に、副官であろう？
まだまだ、やらねばならぬ仕事が山積みじゃぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_126<tab>As soon as we get permission for the Qalyana recruitsss to join, we'll need a garrison for them. We should start the preparations right away!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_000_126さあ、ふたりとも！
上層部の許可が下りたら、新しい兵舎の建築に取り掛かる故、
休んでいる場合ではないぞ～！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_130<tab>I really had my hands full trying to keep Alpa safe. I'm just glad it's over.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_000_130アルパを守りながら戦うのには骨が折れたけど、
ひとまず、一件落着だねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MZHETTIA_000_135<tab>Did you see me? I think I'm starting to get used to this fighting lark!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MZHETTIA_000_135師匠、オレの戦いぶりはどうでした？
あの頃に比べて、かなりやるようになったでしょ？

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_140<tab>I never get tired of looking at Alpa's griffin statues. They're so majestic, so dynamic!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_140アルパさんの造ったグリフィン像……あれはいいものです。
あの迫力、躍動感……何度見に来ても飽きません！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_141<tab>Alpa fought to sssave us and offered asssylum here at Castellum Velodyna. We would give our lives for her.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_000_141シュー……我らを受け入れてくれた隊長のご厚意に報いるため、
身を粉にして働く覚悟がある。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_150<tab>Permission to accept the Qalyana refugees has been granted and a new Ananta garrison has been built at Castellum Velodyna.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_150カリヤナ派からの逃亡者の受け入れ許可が下り、
カステッルム・ベロジナに、「アナンタ族兵舎」が増設されました！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_151<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sworn<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Vira.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_151「アナンタ族：アルパ国境警備隊」との友好関係が、
「誓約」になりました。
国境警備隊の恩人として、語り継がれていくでしょう。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_152<tab>Furthermore, you will receive an experience point bonus upon completion of the Vira beast tribe daily quests.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_152これ以降、「アナンタ族：アルパ国境警備隊」の、
「蛮族デイリークエスト」で獲得できる経験値に、
さらなるボーナスが付加されます！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_153<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_153<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_154<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_154<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_155<tab>You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Madhura.
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_SYSTEM_000_155また、「マドゥラ」より、
「友好関係：誓約」の商品を購入できるようになりました。
今後の冒険に役立てましょう！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Defeat the Qalyana pursuers while protecting your allies!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_QIB_001_TODO_1味方を守りつつ
敵勢力をすべて撃退しろ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_QIB_002_TODO_1<tab>Defeat Vanisha the One Truth!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_QIB_002_TODO_1<tab>純真のヴァニシャを倒せ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_A_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>A Vira?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_A_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>シュー……クッ、ウィルラの者か！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>Don't be alarmed! We're not your enemies!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>しゅ～……待て、我らは敵ではない！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY03040_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>These traitors are in league with the Vira! Ssslay them all!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY03040_BATTLETALK_000_001シュー……おのれ、ウィルラに助けを求めるとは！
一族の面汚しどもめ、皆殺しにしてくれる！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY03040_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>Curssse these interlopers!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY03040_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>シュー……ええい、うっとうしい連中だ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>We'll deal with you murderers!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_BATTLETALK_000_001オレたちの縄張りに入ってきたのは、アンタらだろ？
イヤなら出て行けばいいのさ。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>We are sssisters! Why must we fight?
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_BATTLETALK_000_002しゅ～……わらわたちは、同じ姿に生まれた姉妹ではないか！
なぜ争う必要があるのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_B_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>Any wounded must fall back! We will hold off their asssault!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_B_BATTLETALK_001_001シュー……傷ついた者は下がれ！
我らはここで迎え撃つ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY03040_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>We have tarried long enough. Thisss ends now!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY03040_BATTLETALK_002_001シュー……児戯は終いだ！
今度こそ皆殺しにしてくれる！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_A_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>We cannot repel sssuch an onslaught...
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_A_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>……クッ、ここまでか……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>Get back! Leave this to the Gatekeepers!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_BATTLETALK_002_001しゅ～……おぬしらは下がれ！
この場は、我ら国境警備隊が引き受けるのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_A_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>Why would you go ssso far to protect usss?
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANASOLDIER03040_A_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>何故、そうまでして我らを……。

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>Don't worry about that now! Jussst get out of here!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_BATTLETALK_002_002話し込んでいる時間はない！
今はとにかく、避難を優先するのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>Some of them are going for Alpa! I'll draw their attention away from her. You finish them off!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_BATTLETALK_002_001アルパだけを狙っているヤツがいるみたいだ！
オレが炙り出してみせるから、アンタが仕留めてくれ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MZHETTIA_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>M'zhet Tia, son of M'aht Nunh has entered the fray! Who wants to taste my steel?
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MZHETTIA_BATTLETALK_003_001メ・アト・ヌンの嫡男、メ・ゼト・ティア推参！
さあ、オレの相手はどいつだァ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY_BOSS_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>This one has ssspirit! But know this─only death awaits those who defy us!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY_BOSS_BATTLETALK_003_001シュー……ずいぶんと威勢のいいことだな。
だが、美神の加護を受けし我らの敵ではない！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TAHLAMOLKOH_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>I'll handle these smaller ones! Griffin's Bane, the leader is all yours!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TAHLAMOLKOH_BATTLETALK_003_001なら、私は一番弱そうなヤツを引き受けますね。
強そうなのは、「仮面殺し」の英雄にお任せします！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>At least you know your limits, Tahla! I'll go with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_BATTLETALK_003_001アッハッハ、正直でいいねぇ！
ならオレたちは、英雄殿のサポートに回るよ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>She must be their commander. Watch out─she's not like the others!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_ALPA_BATTLETALK_003_001しゅ～……こやつが首魁のようじゃな。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、皆、気を引き締めていくぞ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY_BOSS_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>Sssisters... Grant me your strength!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY_BOSS_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>シュー……美神の子らよ、我に力を貸し与えたまえ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TAHLAMOLKOH_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>She's gathering aether! We have to stop her before it's too late!
target:
TEXT_BANANA005_03040_TAHLAMOLKOH_BATTLETALK_003_002対象の魔力増大を確認……！
このまま放っておくのは危険です！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY_BOSS_BATTLETALK_003_003<tab>Death to the heathens!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_KARYANAENEMY_BOSS_BATTLETALK_003_003<tab>さあ、ひれ伏せ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>Not this again!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_JOLHMYN_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>まったく……しつこいねぇ！

source: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MZHETTIA_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>For mere underlings, they certainly put up a fight!
target: TEXT_BANANA005_03040_MZHETTIA_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>雑魚どもめ……お前らの相手は、このオレだ！
